lead_paragraph: The Dawning Nebulae computer has achieved a sustained speed of 1.27 petaflops — the equivalent of one thousand trillion mathematical operations a second.
snippet: The Dawning Nebulae computer has achieved a sustained speed of 1.27 petaflops — the equivalent of one thousand trillion mathematical operations a second.

headline.main: Chinese Supercomputer Is Ranked World’s Second-Fastest, Challenging U.S. Dominance
headline.seo: Chinese Edge Closer to Supercomputing Record
headline.print_headline: Chinese Supercomputer Is Ranked World’s Second-Fastest, Challenging U.S. Dominance
